summary_promot:

img_summary: The image shows a screen from a video game, specifically the equipment menu. The central focus is on a detailed 3D model of a bell-shaped object with intricate carvings and cut-out designs. The background is dark, with a silhouette of a figure, possibly a character or statue, partially visible. The top of the screen displays menu options such as Self-Advance, Relics, Equipment, Inventory, Journal, and Settings. The bottom of the screen provides control options for exiting the examination or returning to the previous menu. The top right corner shows two icons with numerical values, 13391 and 50, which could represent in-game currency or points.
